title: The Case against rubella
brief_description: Shows rubella-damaged children with various handicaps, including blindness and brain damage. Outlines the history of the disease and stresses that Rubella and its serious consequences can now be prevented by newly developed vaccines. Briefly shows research efforts and how the vaccines are to be used
